title: Hentai ana nozoki: Kusamura wo kage
overview: Shadow is a screenwriter who can't sell. Yuri, who was a popular actress, retired after marrying her girlfriend, Kagechu. She lives a poor life, and although her film buddies, director Sumita and actress Mina, are worried about her, she believes that Kagechu will one day write her a screenplay that will wow the world...
